verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu shakhti gori yellakaalamu vedu Yesu daashatho mimmu daasi nadupunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Durbuddhi kubhaasha maanundu sadaa Paapaatmula pondu thappinchukoni Shridevun perun dooshimpakayu Shlaaginchuchu meeru vardhillu dilan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jayinchedu vaaru soundharya prabhun Vaaru makutambu dharinchedaru Prabhundagu Yesu nikkambu nammu Daayene nityambu saayamu nitchun{/lang-eng}
